name: Akshat Garg
title: Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
about: Hey there! I'm a passionate software engineer from India, specializing in UI development and full stack web applications. With expertise in JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS, NextJS, and Qwik, I create high-performance, user-friendly software solutions for businesses and open source. I'm Computer Science graduate (2023) from Birla Institute of Technology Mesra, Ranchi. In addition to writing code for companies, I enjoy contributing to open-source projects and exploring the world of blogging. Outside of work, I love traveling, trekking, and capturing scenic photographs.

feedbacks.author: Shyam Seshadari
feedbacks.feedback: At Builder.io, we decided to hire an intern, and with our posting, we had a few thousand applicants. We shortlisted, and interviewed only Akshat in the first lot, and as soon as we interviewed him, we stopped. He was that good. As an intern, Akshat showed the kind of independence you would expect from a seasoned software engineer, from picking up new technologies, making large scale changes, debugging difficult issues, and creating reproductions. In addition, he was always up for a challenge, creating tools to automate screenshot diffing, and load testing of some of our APIs. I really wish Akshat the best, and I would hope to be able to work with him again!
